short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes "Jira Software will be deactivated" banner

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Jira Deactivation Banner Remover is a handy Chrome extension designed to enhance your Jira experience by eliminating the intrusive "Jira Software will be deactivated" banner. Say goodbye to distractions and focus on your work with this simple yet effective tool. Install now and enjoy a clutter-free Jira interface!
